co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Interface Flow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Processor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlow

    public interface Flow
extends Processor
    Flow is a collection of Flowlets that are wired together into a Direct Acylic Graph (DAG).

    Implement this interface to create a flow. The configure(co.cask.cdap.api.flow.FlowConfigurer) method will be invoked during deployment time.

    See the Cask DAP Developer Guide and the CDAP instance example applications.
    See Also:
    Flowlet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(FlowConfigurer flowConfigurer)
      Configure the Flow using a FlowConfigurer.
